topic: 13. The OO testing integration strategy involves testing
options: groups of classes that collaborate or communicate in some way
single operations as they are added to the evolving class implementation
operator programs derived from use-case scenarios
topic_cn: 13. 面向对象测试的集成策略涉及测试
options_cn: 以某种方式协作或通信的类的组
在不断演化的类实现中添加的单个操作
从用例场景中派生的操作程序
